Mayor - William D. Tate
=======================

Email:
[William D. Tate](mailto:wtate@grapevinetexas.gov "William D. Tate")
MayorTate-Retouched-201-229
City Council
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Elected to City Council 1972
* Elected Mayor 1973-1985
* Re-elected Mayor 1988-Present
* Current term expires: 2027

* Crime Control and Prevention District Board
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 1
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 2

* Grapevine Rotary Club, member
* Grapevine City Attorney, 1969-1972

* Baylor Regional Medical Center Board of Trustees, board member
* Grapevine High School Hall of Fame, 1989
* Boy Scouts of America Silver Eagle Award, 2007
* Hospitality Industry Development Award from Texas Travel Industry, 2000
* Citizen of the Year Award, 1976
* Who’s Who in Texas, member

* Law practice and title company in Grapevine
* State Bar of Texas Member
* American Bar Association Member
* Married to Betty Tate – retired GCISD teacher

* [Report
  An Issue](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/389)
